title: SEA Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)
description: Three to five years after graduation, SEA alumni must be able to:

peos.PEO 1: Demonstrate technical competence in the analysis of problems and design of systems, considering technical, professional, societal, environmental, economic, and ethical dimensions.
peos.PEO 2: Apply their talents and full potentials in the practice of their profession, guided by Christian tenets of honesty, service, dedication, and moral responsibility.
peos.PEO 3: Pursue advanced education, research and development, and other creative efforts in science and technology.
peos.PEO 4: Participate actively to address social, technical, and business challenges vital to national progress and development.
